tag.description: The liferay-security:permissionsURL tag renders an HTML anchor tag (hyperlink) that the user can click on in order to see the Liferay Permissions screen for the associated resource.

attribute.description: The fully qualified Java class of the model resource. For example: MyModelResource.class.getName().
attribute.name: modelResource

attribute.description: The description of the model resource.
attribute.name: modelResourceDescription

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The primary key value of the model resource.
attribute.name: resourcePrimKey

attribute.description: The text of the hyperlink that the user will see and click on.
attribute.name: value
